name: slendytubbies v1 beta
description:
I have found it slendytubbies v1 beta. the lost version of the game and the version that markilpliler played! hope u enjoy it and btw u need win rar download here: https://www.win-rar.com/start.html?&L=0 

here are the differences 

  • there are no Slendytubby nearby sounds
  • CO-OP mode is the mode instead of competitive mode 
  • The game does end if one player dies 
  • Versus jumping bug (yay I guess)
  • there is no In-game Lobby/start game feature
  • there is no In-game text-chat
  • there are no Sounds on custard pickup
  • and of course, virus mode works 
  • btw to play  u need to download logmeinhatchmi here: https://vpn.net/ and that's it bye for now ;)
